author: Twisted Sister
title: Pot
text: Khat (Cathinone) Bath Salts (3,4-methylenedioxypyrovalerone or MDPV) Yes, "pot," heroin, LSD ... same thing. Schedule 2 drugs - the "not so bad" drugs include every opiate besides heroin, methamphetamine, cocaine, and some of the drugs used for lethal injections. So sure, let's keep "recreational""marijuana" illegal, but allow "medical" marijuana because marijuana is a Schedule 1 drug, which means that marijuana has no currently accepted medical treatment use in the U.S., and there is a lack of accepted safety for use of the drug or substance under medical supervision, and in fact it's as dangerous as heroin, and more dangerous than meth or cocaine. Onward and upward in the War on Drugs.... damned insanity and hypocrisy. Last edited by imaginethat; October 15th, 2015 at 07:38 AM .
